TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，可以指定操作的行为。The enable you to specify the behavior of a manipulation. 使用来执行以下操作：Use the to do the following: - 指定位置应为相对于元素通过设置属性。Specify that the position should be relative to an element by setting the property. - 指定是否通过设置启用单指操作属性。Specify whether single-finger manipulation are enabled by setting the property. - 指定哪些类型的操作启用通过设置属性设置为枚举。Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the property to a enumeration. - 通过设置指定的单指旋转中心属性。Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the property. - 通过设置来取消该操作属性设置为`true`。Cancel the manipulation by setting the property to `true`. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 取消操作并将触摸提升为鼠标事件。

span.span: Cancels the manipulation and promotes touch to mouse events.

returns.span: 如果触摸成功提升为鼠标事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if touch was successfully promoted to mouse events, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法成功，则默认发送上一个触摸事件与鼠标按下事件和未来的操作事件不会发生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch down events as mouse down events and future manipulation events do not occur.

summary.span: 获取或设置所有操作事件和计算都与之相关的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets the container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 所有操作事件和计算都与之相关的容器。

span.span: The container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 默认值为发生事件的元素。

span.span: The default is the element on which the event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定位置应为相对于另一个元素通过设置属性。You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the property. 例如，可以使操作位置相对于接收操作事件的元素的父级。For example, you can make the manipulation positions relative to the parent of the element that receives the manipulation events. 事件处理程序是可以在其中设置的唯一位置。The event handler is the only place in which you can set the . 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个描述单点操作的轴的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

value.span: 一个描述单点操作的轴的对象。

span.span: An object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置属性，当用户在操作过程中使用一个手指，操作将包含轮换数据。When you set the property, the manipulation will contain rotation data when the user uses one finger during a manipulation. 这是为了模拟真实情况下，可以使用一个手指来旋转对象，例如一张纸上一个表。This is to simulate real-world situations where you can use one finger to rotate an object, such as a piece of paper on a table. 如果是`null`，用户必须使用两根手指进行旋转。If the is `null`, the user must use two fingers to cause rotation. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件和集属性。The following example shows an event handler for the event and sets the property. 若要测试此示例中，按照中的步骤[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)和在步骤 4 中的代码替换此代码。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 4 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#manipulationpivot)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#manipulationpivot)]

summary.span: 将参数添加到指定元素的当前操作中。

span.span: Adds parameters to the current manipulation of the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不需要调用此方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 使用上的属性相反。Use the properties on the instead.
